data.name: FrmMain_CancelledDownload_DownloadPathInvalid
data.value: Download path and destination USB drive are the same, please change your download path.

data.name: FrmMain_CancelledDownload_FormatUSB
FrmMain_CancelledDownload_NoApps
data.value: Mode is reformat or downgrade and no apps package has been selected, this will result in a non booting system, ABORTING! No "APPS" package has been selected but Syn3 Updater has determined that a downgrade or reformat is required, this will result in a non booting system. Aborting!

data.name: FrmMain_CancelledDownload_NoUSB
data.value: No USB drive selected would you like to continue with just the download?

data.name: FrmMain_CancelledDownload_RegionMismatch
data.value: Current region and new region are not the same, this may not work. Would you like to continue anyway?

data.name: FrmMain_cmbLocale_Restart
data.value: Would you like to restart application to change language? If you do not restart some elements may not be translated correctly

data.name: FrmMain_CopyFiles_CompletePopup
data.value:
The download and copy of the files is now complete, simply eject this USB from your computer and insert it in your car, make sure the engine is running!
Syn3Updater will now open you directly to the relevant part of the CyanLabs tutorial for you to follow in your car.

data.name: FrmMain_CopyFiles_UpdateVersion
data.value: Would you like to update your current sync version in the app so it's correct for future use?

data.name: FrmMain_CopyFiles_VerificationFailed
data.value: Failed to verify file 3 times, ensure USB drive and port are fully functional.

data.name: FrmMain_CurrentConfiguration
data.value: Current Version: {0} - Region: {1} - Navigation: {2} Download Path: {3}

data.name: FrmMain_FrmMain_Shown_Extra_BackendError
data.value: There was an issue trying to retrieve the list of files from the online server, please check your internet connection and make sure the application has internet access

data.name: FrmSetup_btnChangeDownloadDirectory_ChangeDirectory
FrmSetup_ForceAutoInstall
data.value:
This will override the detection of the most appropriate install mode using this with a full release with maps will almost certainly cause issues.
This setting will have no effect if your current version is set to below 3.0 or below.
This setting will default back to "automatic" after each restart.
By changing this from "automatic" you agree to not be eligible for support while this option is enabled!

data.name: LogFormat
data.value: Re-creating partition table as MBR and formatting as ExFat on selected USB drive

data.name: LogNoMD5
data.value: No MD5 value found in database, comparing files size of {0}
